name: Spring Compressor Tool, Heavy-Duty Coil Spring Compressor Tool with Locking Pins, Strut Spring Compressor 13/16" Socket 1/2" Drive to Compress The Coil Spring
short_description: Safe Strut Maintenance Tool: A strut spring compressor tool set is ideal for compressing coil springs on MacPherson-style strut assemblies. It is commonly used for routine maintenance like replacing struts, shock absorbers, and springs. It also allows for repairs on bent struts, strut tubes, and damaged components

Wide Application: This spring compressor tool set compresses MacPherson strut springs of different sizes on most vehicles. It has a hex-shaped end for use with a 13/16-inch wrench or socket, with a 1/2-inch extension option. The threaded rods are 11.2 inches long and can open up to 8.46 inches to fit coil springs

Locks Into Place: This coil spring compressor tool features an Acme threaded rod, wide spring contact surface, and detent pins to securely lock the coil spring in place during compression. The durable Acme threaded rod allows for smooth compression of springs, whether on or off the vehicle, using either manual or power tools

Built To Last: The Macpherson strut spring compressor has a strong design with heat-treated forcing hooks and hardened center screws. These components are extremely durable, non-bending, and offer maximum strength and longevity. This ensures that your tool can handle heavy-duty tasks and last for years

Easy To Use: Make sure hooks are aligned, position them opposite each other, tighten the rod evenly, and remove the nut to release the cartridge. This heavy-duty coil spring compressor fixes bent parts and conducts essential suspension maintenance on MacPherson struts and springs in small to medium-sized cars

name: Coil Spring Compressor Tool, Heavy Duty Macpherson Strut Spring Compressor Tool,Ultra-Rugged Strut Spring Compressor Tool with Safety Guard,2200lb Capacity 11in Jaw Opening (Blue)
short_description: Robust Coil Spring Compressor Tool: Our heavy-duty spring compressor tool for struts and coil springs is engineered to minimize tool flexing, bending, and warping, instilling confidence in mechanics for professional-grade performance. The retractable bracket ensures stable parallel compression, essential for precision work in automotive repairs.

Built for Endurance: Crafted from #45 carbon steel, our compressor tool delivers exceptional durability. The black oxide finish not only enhances its resistance to corrosion and rust but also lends it a sleek, professional look. The rugged frame design minimizes flexing, bending, and warping, even under high tension, ensuring longevity and reliability. With a robust capacity of up to 2,200 pounds (1000kg), this tool can handle the demands of heavy-duty automotive applications.

Secure Grip Hooks: Say goodbye to flimsy hooks prone to slippage and safety hazards. Our coil compressor hooks firmly grip springs, thanks to easy-to-use hex nuts that ensure a secure hold, providing peace of mind during use.

Effortless Operation: Our compressor tool is designed for user-friendly operation. Simply extend the internally threaded rod to its full length and attach the bracket jaws onto the spring. Adjust the safeguard and tighten the locking nut to secure the setup in place. With a hand ratchet or wrench, smoothly and evenly crank the hex socket to compress the spring with ease and precision.

Universal Compatibility: With a generous jaw capacity ranging from 23 mm to 280 mm, our coil spring compressor tool is versatile and suitable for a wide range of vehicles. Whether it's compact cars, large trucks, or anything in between, our strut spring compressor tool kit is up to the task. It's the go-to solution for mechanics handling compression jobs across various vehicle makes and models, offering unparalleled versatility and reliability.
